titles.title: Securing Airspace for Emergency Responders Act of 2018
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the use of unauthorized unmanned aircrafts over wildfires.
Securing Airspace for Emergency Responders Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Securing Airspace for Emergency Responders Act of 2018
This bill amends the federal criminal code to prohibit the unauthorized operation of an unmanned aircraft over a wildfire.
A violator is subject to criminal penalties—a fine, a prison term of at least one year, or both.
